local_intent: Detect the red plate, move above it, lower until light contact is detected, then open gripper and retreat.
assumptions: White plate is already held in gripper
Red plate is visible and within reach from above
coherence_with_global: Implements the GLOBAL_BT 'place' phase: detects red_plate, moves above, lowers until contact, verifies contact, releases (open gripper), and retreats. Adds a RetryUntilSuccessful (3 attempts) to recover from missed contact as described in failure_and_recovery.
